idea-plugin.name: MicroGenerator
idea-plugin.description: MicroGenerator is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin that automatically generates fully functional Spring Boot microservices based on a YAML specification. It creates project structure, configuration files, entities, repositories, DTOs, mappers, services, and REST controllers for each defined model. Ideal for quickly scaffolding microservice architectures and accelerating backend development.

action.description: Generates complete Spring Boot microservice projects from a YAML specification.
